role.descr: agent // mechanism, process, entity(imply to condition or property in that entity) //
entity receiving the biological property // gene product, celll, tissue, etc. //

example.text: Besides these side chain interactions with the 06-alkyl group, structure-based analysis of mutational data suggests that resistance has been conferred by substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 to 06-BG through backbone distortions.

Besides these side chain interactions with the 06-alkyl group, structure-based analysis of mutational data suggests that resistance is believed to be conferred by substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 to 06-BG through backbone distortions.

Besides these side chain interactions with the 06-alkyl group, structure-based analysis of mutational data suggests that substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 would have conferred resistance to 06-BG through backbone distortions.
Human 06-alkylguaning-DNA alkyltransferase (AGT) having conferred resistance to alkylation chemotherapies was therefore an active anticancer drug target.
Human 06-alkylguaning-DNA alkyltransferase (AGT) that confers resistance to alkylation chemotherapies is therefore an active anticancer drug target.
Human 06-alkylguaning-DNA alkyltransferase (AGT) which is able to confer resistance to alkylation chemotherapies was therefore an active anticancer drug target.
In itself, an increased risk of diabetes may not be conferred by the gene variant.

Increased AGT levels parallel acquired alkylation resistance in human tumors (Brent et al., 1985; Mattern et al., 1998), and resistance may have been conferred by transfection of AGT to alkylation-sensitive cells (Kaina et al., 1991), demonstrating the role of AGT in therapeutic resistance.

Increased AGT levels parallel acquired alkylation resistance in human tumors (Brent et al., 1985; Mattern et al., 1998), and transfection of AGT can confer resistance to alkylation-sensitive cells (Kaina et al., 1991), demonstrating the role of AGT in therapeutic resistance.
Likewise, the introduced charge of Gly160His and Gly160Arg mutants would repel the benzyl group (Figure 3B), the 06-BG resistance can be conferred by these mutations (Xu-Welliver et al., 1999a).

Likewise, the introduced charge of Gly160His and Gly160Arg mutants would repel the benzyl group (Figure 3B), the 06-BG resistance is able to be conferred by these mutations (Xu-Welliver et al., 1999a).
Nonsense or frameshift alterations in the coding sequence or by splice variants did not confer loss-of-function mutations.
example.arg: nonsense or frameshift alterations in the coding sequence or by splice variants

example.text: Nonsense or frameshift alterations in the coding sequence or by splice variants were not able to confer loss-of-function mutations.
example.arg: nonsense or frameshift alterations in the coding sequence or by splice variants

example.text: Specificity for either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP) might be conferred by the portion of the STATs.
example.arg: either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP)

example.text: That the portion of the STATs is believed to confer specificity for either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP) has not been determined.
example.arg: either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP)

example.text: In addition, EvgA overexpression did not confer resistance in a tolC-deficient strain.

Besides these side chain interactions with the 06-alkyl group, structure-based analysis of mutational data suggests that The portion of the STATs were able to confer specificity to either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP) through backbone distortions.
example.arg: either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP)

example.text: Besides these side chain interactions with the 06-alkyl group, structure-based analysis of mutational data suggests that the Stat5 phenotype of stability in the presence of MG132 can have been conferred by simply replacing the C-terminus with that of Stat5 to Stat1 through backbone distortions.
example.arg: simply replacing the C-terminus with that of Stat5
the Stat5 phenotype of stability in the presence of MG132

example.text: In addition, Human 06-alkylguaning-DNA alkyltransferase did not confer resistance in a tolC-deficient strain.
In addition, The portion of the STATs will not confer specificity in a tolC-deficient strain.
In addition, substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 is not able to confer resistance in a tolC-deficient strain.

In itself, resistance would not be conferred by transfection of AGT.
In itself, substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 is believed not to confer resistance.

Increased AGT levels parallel acquired alkylation resistance in human tumors (Brent et al., 1985; Mattern et al., 1998), and resistance could be conferred by substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 to 06-BG (Kaina et al., 1991), demonstrating the role of AGT in therapeutic resistance.

Increased AGT levels parallel acquired alkylation resistance in human tumors (Brent et al., 1985; Mattern et al., 1998), and resistance is believed to be conferred by substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 to 06-BG (Kaina et al., 1991), demonstrating the role of AGT in therapeutic resistance.

Increased AGT levels parallel acquired alkylation specificity in human tumors (Brent et al., 1985; Mattern et al., 1998), and The portion of the STATs could confer resistance to either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP) (Kaina et al., 1991), demonstrating the role of AGT in therapeutic resistance.
example.arg: either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP)

example.text: Resistance can have been conferred by human 06-alkylguaning-DNA alkyltransferase (AGT), which directly reverses endogenous alkylation at the 06-position of guanine, to alkylation-sensitive cells.
Resistance would be conferred by human 06-alkylguaning-DNA alkyltransferase (AGT), which directly reverses endogenous alkylation at the 06-position of guanine, to Stat1.
Specificity for Stat1 can be conferred by the portion of the STATs.
Specificity for Stat1 was conferred by the portion of the STATs.
Specificity for alkylation-sensitive cells may be conferred by the portion of the STATs.
Specificity for alkylation-sensitive cells might be conferred by the portion of the STATs.
Specificity for alkylation-sensitive cells might be conferred by the portion of the STATs.
That the portion of the STATs can confer resistance for 06-BG has not been determined.
That the portion of the STATs has conferred resistance for alkylation chemotherapies has not been determined.
That the portion of the STATs is believed to confer resistance for alkylation chemotherapies has not been determined.
That the portion of the STATs was able to confer resistance for alkylation-sensitive cells has not been determined.
The data from the chimeras indicate that the difference is due to the absence of carboxyl sequences in 06-BG, since substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 may confer resistance on Stat1.

The data from the chimeras indicate that the difference is due to the absence of carboxyl sequences in alkylation-sensitive cells, since transfection of AGT has the ability to confer resistance on Stat1.

The data from the chimeras indicate that the difference is due to the absence of carboxyl sequences in either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP), since specificity is able to be conferred on Stat1 by The portion of the STATs.
example.arg: either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP)

example.text: The portion of the STATs (AGT) which has conferred specificity to either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP) was therefore an active anticancer drug target.
example.arg: either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP)

example.text: The portion of the STATs (AGT), which directly reverses endogenous alkylation at the 06-position of guanine, will confer specificity to either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP) and is therefore an active anticancer drug target.
example.arg: either a MAPK or a MAPK substrate kinase (MAPKAP)

example.text: an increased risk of diabetes in a tolC-deficient strain may have been conferred by the gene variant.
specificity in a tolC-deficient strain is conferred by The portion of the STATs.
substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 (AGT) which can confer resistance to 06-BG was therefore an active anticancer drug target.
substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 (AGT) which is believed to confer resistance to 06-BG was therefore an active anticancer drug target.

substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 (AGT), which directly reverses endogenous alkylation at the 06-position of guanine, may confer resistance to 06-BG and is therefore an active anticancer drug target.

substitutions at Gly156 and Lys165 (AGT), which directly reverses endogenous alkylation at the 06-position of guanine, was observed to confer resistance to 06-BG and was therefore an active anticancer drug target.
transfection of AGT conferring resistance for alkylation-sensitive cells has not been determined.
In addition, nonsense or frameshift alterations in the coding sequence or by splice variants may not confer loss-of-function mutations in a tolC-deficient strain.
example.arg: nonsense or frameshift alterations in the coding sequence or by splice variants
